text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: - Pool ID (if not defaulted based on condition)
- Apply PDS Profit Rate (For Fixed Profit Mudaraba Deposits)
Note: Various attributes are defaulted from the product which can be
amended wherever required (e.g. Tax, Alerts etc.) System generates

rect.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 2px; fill: none;

path.style: fill: none; stroke-width: 2px; stroke: black;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: Auto funding/ Settlement can be performed for AA deposits
There are three types of auto funding
- Partial funding (deposit to be funded to extent of the funds
- None (If the balance is fully sufficient the deposit would be fully
funded from the account, else no auto funding would take place)

Due bill is generated which needs

rect.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 2px; fill: none;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: if the funding does not happen before a
fixed number of days defined in the cancel period,
the system automatically cancels the deposit
